The men of the Maoka family have to meet a fated woman by the age of eighteen.
Otherwise, he must die at eighteen.
In other words, today, my 17th birthday, Riku Maoka's, is only one year away.
But I had a nasty constitution to avoid that sad fate.
Morever there are two
The first is that  I only draws Yandere to a level that is difficult even if there is a destined person in this.
The other is that it is a detective.
It's like going out for a minute and getting involved in a case.
So, I came across a dead body again today...
Maybe it's not that the criminal is his fate, is it?>
